# preset(_:)

**Type Method**

Returns a reverb instance that you can set on a reverb component.

## Declaration

```swift
static func preset(_ preset: Reverb.Preset) -> Reverb
```

## Parameters

- **preset**: A reverberation preset.

## Return Value

Reverb that can be set on a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ReverbComponent].
title: preset(_:)
